      • Endgame

        public void Endgame​(int p1validcounter,
                    int p2validcounter,
                    int pointCounterX,
                    int pointCounterY)
        This is the method that ends the game, it counts all the board pieces to get the final score and to make sure that the user has no valid moves
        Parameters:
        p1validcounter - counts all the valid moves for player 1
        p2validcounter - counts all the valid moves for player 2
        pointCounterX - counts all the valid moves for player 3
        pointCounterY - counts all the valid moves for player 4

      • countPointsY

        public int countPointsY()
        this is the method that counts all the O pieces on the board
        Returns:
        The return for this method is the total amount of piece on the board
